title: The new cannabis capsule is so powerful it could replace pain killers | SHROOM | 98ROCK
text:
The new cannabis capsule is so powerful it could replace pain killers posted by Shroom - share 
Let's talk about weed for a minute. 
We all know the legalization of marijuana is a huge debate in the United States. Many supporters believe it's very healthy while others who oppose it believe it can be addictive. 
A new study has now shown that a new cannabis capsule could ' provide as much pain relief as current painkillers, and even replace them altogether! ' 
Many see this pill as a great thing since an estimated 4.7 million Americans are dependent on painkillers. New studies have shown that cannabis has no known addictive elements. 
Right now this is only available in the state of California and it has NOT been approved by the FDA. So please talk to your doctor before continuing treatment of any kind. 
What do you think? Would you give it a try? 
Fight the pain without the high. Take a look at how cannabis could take over modern painkillers!
